import logo from './components/BK-plant-logo.png'; import React from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom'; import './Style/Semantic/semantic.css' import Main_hr from './components/main' import './components/style.css' document.body.style.backgroundColor = '#FFF5EE' function turn_on_search() { var mini_search_bar = document.getElementById("mini_search_bar"); mini_search_bar.style.display = 'none'; var wide_search_bar = document.getElementById("wide_search_bar"); wide_search_bar.style.display = 'inline-block' } function turn_off_search() { var wide_search_bar = document.getElementById("wide_search_bar"); wide_search_bar.style.display = 'none'; var mini_search_bar = document.getElementById("mini_search_bar"); mini_search_bar.style.display = 'inline-block'; } var item ='item' const Menubar = (props) => { return (
